'''In Pursuit of the Lost Inscription''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Monumental Study (Quest)}}. It is used during the {{Quest|Search for the Lost Monument Fragments}}.

==Text==
...The inscription has long been lost, and mortals have no inkling of its form.<br>
...to the descendants of the divine bird, bound to where destiny was decreed.<br>
As a land where the Pari of the Vourukasha Oasis have long dwelled.<br>
As a land guarded by Barsom's familiar.<br>
As a land defended by thorns like blades.<br>
Or as the Tunigi Catastrophe... remnants of ash and wizened husks... zenith.
